body:
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _  _ _ _ _ _ _ _  _ _ _ _ _ 
Hey there, Ingigo here, Today I present my new intro. The programs I used to make this intro is
Cinema 4D and After Effects. The Plugins I used was Magic Bullet Looks, S-Shake (Sapphire Plugins)
and RSMB. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VXxgixDR7iw
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _  _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
▼ Music Used:
"Legend'' Drake (Oden Remix) (Emphasized)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_P5hkinX52w
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _  _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

replies.body: I have to be honest, the main reason why I disliked it is because it was too much, the flashing bothered me mainly because I used to have epilepsy(I don't anymore) but I do think about people who do suffer from it, the music doesn't fit too well and volume could be reduced but if that's what you wanted to do that's fine but I just wanted to be honest instead of -clenches teeth smiling- wow 10/10 what a great videooo.... that's not me and I'm not fake.
replies.body_tagged: I have to be honest, the main reason why I disliked it is because it was too much, the flashing bothered me mainly because I used to have epilepsy(I don't anymore) but I do think about people who do suffer from it, the music doesn't fit too well and volume could be reduced but if that's what you wanted to do that's fine but I just wanted to be honest instead of -clenches teeth smiling- wow 10/10 what a great videooo.... that's not me and I'm not fake.

replies.body: Personally 5, agreed with BmB don't make an intro like that you see mostly all the tryhard youtubers have that. Just keep it simple none of the bumping and out to the music and none of those stone things in the way. It's also hard to read so keep it simple. The music as well is too loud and doesn't really fit in. Try be a different youtuber unique in a way.
